argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | circgrp.1 | |- C = ( `' abs " { 1 } ) |
| 2 |  | circgrp.2 | |- T = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = y -> ( _i x. x ) = ( _i x. y ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = y -> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) = ( exp ` ( _i x. y ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_cbvmptv | |- ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) = ( y e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. y ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_efifo | |- ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) : RR -onto-> C |
| 7 |  | #P_forn | |- ( ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) : RR -onto-> C -> ran ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) = C ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ran ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) = C |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomi | |- C = ran ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s C ) = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ran ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_eqtri | |- T = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s ran ( x e. RR |-> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> _i e. CC ) |
| 14 |  | #P_resubdrg | |- ( RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ RRfld e. DivRing ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_simpli | |- RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 16 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> RR e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_ax-mp | |- RR e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> RR e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 11, 13, 18 | #P_efabl | |- ( T. -> T e. Abel ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_trud | |- T e. Abel |
